Sidang Orangtua Murid Gugat SMA Gonzaga Kembali Ditunda
04 Nov 2019, 14:23 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Sidang gugatan perdata orangtua murid terhadap SMA Gonzaga. (CNN Indonesia/Feybien Ramayanti)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Sidang gugatan perdata Yustina Supatmi, orang tua murid yang menggugat guru karena kecewa anaknya tidak naik kelas, terhadap SMA Kolese Gonzaga, Pejaten Barat, Jakarta Selatan kembali ditunda. Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan rencananya akan kembali menggelar sidang pada Senin (11/11).Majelis hakim menunda sidang karena surat kuasa dari salah satu pihak tergugat, yakni Dinas Pendidikan DKI Jakarta belum lengkap. Sidang ini merupakan sidang kedua, sebelumnya pada Senin pekan lalu, hakim juga menunda persidangan."Sidang ditunda hingga minggu depan karena surat kuasa pihak turut tergugat belum lengkap," tutur Hakim Lenny Wati Mulasimadhi dalam persidangan di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan, Senin (4/11).Pantauan CNNIndonesia.com, hakim PN Jaksel membuka sidang sekitar pukul 11.00 WIB. Kuasa hukum dari pihak tergugat maupun penggugat juga terlihat hadir di PN Jaksel.Sidang juga dihadiri oleh Yustina. Dia didampingi Arya Andika kakak dari BB, murid SMA Gonzaga yang dinyatakan tidak naik kelas.Yustina menggugat Kepala Sekolah SMA Kolese Gonzaga Paulus Andri Astanto, Wakil Kepala Sekolah Bidang Kurikulum Himawan Santanu, Wakil Kepala Sekolah Bidang Kesiswaan Gerardus Hadian Panamokta, dan guru Sosiologi Kelas XI Agus Dewa Irianto.Selain itu Yustina turut menggugat Kepala Dinas Pendidikan Menengah dan Tinggi Provinsi DKI Jakarta.Yustina menggugat karena menilai keputusan  SMA Gonzaga yang menyatakan BB tak naik kelas cacat hukum."Enggak naik kelas itu urusan biasa, tapi proses tidak naik kelasnya itu kan ada yang harus dilalui. Nah apakah proses-proses itu dilalui itu yang ingin kita buka-bukaan. Ingin diuji di persidangan sebenarnya itu," ujar Arya.Arya mengatakan pihak sekolah belum pernah memberikan peringatan terkait permasalahan yang dihadapi oleh adiknya. Dalam hal ini permasalahan tersebut mengacu pada sejumlah kasus, salah satunya BB ketahuan makan cemilan ketika kegiatan belajar mengajar di kelas berlangsung.Dalam gugatannya Yustina meminta majelis hakim menyatakan BB memenuhi syarat dan berhak untuk melanjutkan proses belajar ke kelas XII SMA Kolese Gonzaga.BB dinyatakan tidak naik kelas karena memiliki nilai sejarah peminatan di bawah Kriteria Ketuntasan Minimal (KKM), yaitu 68. Sedangkan KKM untuk mata pelajaran tersebut adalah 75. Berdasarkan peraturan Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan No. 53 Tahun 2015 tentang Penilaian Hasil Belajar oleh Pendidik dan Saturan Pendidik Pada Dikdasmen, murid bisa dinyatakan tidak naik kelas bila memiliki tiga mata pelajaran dengan nilai kurang dari KKM.Yustina menambahkan pihaknya mau menerima keputusan SMA Gonzaga bahwa BB tidak naik kelas jika alasan yang diberikan jelas. Namun hingga kini mediasi yang diinginkan Yustina belum juga dilakukan."Mediasi itu kan ada mediatornya, pihak sekolah dan orang tua. Itu belum pernah terjadi. Itulah yang kami minta," tambah Yustina kepada rekan wartawan.Menanggapi hal itu, kuasa hukum dari pihak SMA Kolese Gonzaga, Edi Danggur mengatakan mediasi tidak bisa dilakukan jika tujuannya agar BB naik kelas."Aturan main sudah jelas," ujar Edi seusai sidang.Lagipula, kata dia, surat pindah untuk BB semuanya sudah keluar. "Dalam surat pindah itu sudah tegas dikatakan, siswa yang sudah pindah sekolah tidak boleh kembali lagi ke sini," katanya.Tujuan dari mediasi yang diinginkan Yustina awalnya memang agar BB bisa kembali bersekolah di SMA Kolese Gonzaga. Yustina mengatakan dirinya sudah meminta mediasi dengan pihak sekolah sejak bulan Juni. Namun pihak sekolah tak kunjung mengiyakan permintaannya."Iya [meminta BB kembali sekolah], tapi itu kan di awal bulan Juni. Tapi kan lama-lama kok nggak diberi waktu," ujarnya.Yustina mengaku sudah mengajukan permintaan mediasi ke Majelis Perwakilan Kelas (MPK) dan Kepala Yayasan SMA Kolese Gonzaga. Ia juga sempat mengadukan hal ini ke Komisi Perlindungan Hak Indonesia meski ditolak karena BB sudah berusia lebih dari 17 tahun.Membahas persoalan nilai yang dikatakan tak sesuai dengan Permendikbud No. 53 Tahun 2015, Edi berdalih pihak sekolah seyogiyanya dapat menentukan jumlah mata pelajaran untuk menentukan murid tidak naik kelas."Sekolah bisa menentukan dong, satu saja yang tidak naik kelas, orang itu bisa tidak naik kelas," ujarnya.Selain BB, pihak sekolah mengatakan juga ada 16 murid lain yang dinyatakan tidak naik kelas di SMA Kolese Gonzaga. Pihak sekolah tidak merinci satu-satu alasan di balik keputusan tersebut.(fey/ugo)

Parents' Congregation for Gonzaga High School Students Again is Postponed Again
Nov 04 2019, 14:23 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The trial of a parent's civil suit against Gonzaga High School. (CNN Indonesia / Feybien Ramayanti)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Civil law suit Yustina Supatmi, a parent of a student who sued a teacher because she was disappointed her child did not go up to class, against Gonzaga College High School, West Pejaten, South Jakarta, was once again postponed. The South Jakarta District Court plans to hold a hearing on Monday (11/11). The panel of judges adjourned the trial because the power of attorney from one of the defendants, the DKI Jakarta Education Agency, was not yet complete. This trial was the second session, previously on Monday last week, the judge also adjourned the trial. "The trial was adjourned until next week because the defendant's power of attorney was incomplete," said Judge Lenny Wati Mulasimadhi during the trial at the South Jakarta District Court, Monday (4 / 11). CNNIndonesia.com monitoring, South Jakarta District Court judge opens the hearing around 11.00 WIB. The legal counsel of the defendant and the plaintiff was also seen present in South Jakarta District Court. The hearing was also attended by Yustina. He was accompanied by Arya Andika, an older sister from BB, a Gonzaga High School student who was declared not to have graduated. Yustina sued Gonzaga College High School Principal Paulus Andri Astanto, Deputy Principal of the Curriculum Field School, Himawan Santanu, Deputy Principal for Student Affairs Gerardus Hadian Panamokta, and Sociology Class XI teacher Agus Dewa Irianto.In addition, Yustina also sued the Head of DKI Jakarta Provincial Secondary and Higher Education Office. Yustina sued because she considered Gonzaga High School's decision to say BB did not go up for legal defects. " "We have to go through. Now whether those processes are passed are what we want to open. We want to be tested at the actual trial," said Arya. Arya said that the school had never given a warning regarding the problems faced by his younger sibling. In this case the problem refers to a number of cases, one of which BB was caught eating snacks when teaching and learning activities take place in class. In his suit Yustina asked the judges to declare BB to meet the requirements and have the right to continue the learning process to class XII SMA Gonzaga College. graduated because it has a historical value of specialization under the Minimum Mastery Criteria (KKM), which is 68. While the KKM for these subjects is 75. Based on Minister of Education and Culture regulation No. 53 of 2015 concerning Evaluation of Learning Outcomes by Educators and Educators' Arrangements In Elementary Education, students can be declared not going up to class if they have three subjects with grades less than KKM. Yustina added that she would accept the Gonzaga High School's decision that BB did not move up the class if the reasons given were clear . But until now the mediation that Yustina wanted has not yet been carried out. "The mediation has mediators, the school and parents. That has never happened. That is what we ask," Yustina added to fellow journalists. Responding to this, the attorney from the high school Gonzaga College, Edi Danggur said mediation could not be carried out if the aim was for BB to go up to class. "The rules of the game are clear," Edi said after the hearing. Moreover, he said, all moving letters for BB had already come out. "In the transfer letter it has been firmly said, students who have transferred schools must not come back here again," he said. The purpose of the mediation that Yustina initially wanted was so that BB could return to Gonzaga College High School. Yustina said she had requested mediation with the school since June. But the school never agreed to his request. "Yes [asking BB to go back to school], but it was in early June. But after a long time why was not given time," he said. Yustina claimed to have submitted a request for mediation to the Class Representative Assembly (MPK) ) and Head of Gonzaga College High School Foundation. He also briefed this matter to the Indonesian Commission for the Protection of Rights despite being rejected because BB was more than 17 years old. Discussed the issue of values that were said to be incompatible with Permendikbud No. 53 In 2015, Edi argued that schools should be able to determine the number of subjects to determine students not going up to class. "Schools can determine, one person who does not go up in grade, that person can not go up in grade," he said. In addition to BB, the school said there were also 16 other students who were declared not to have graduated in Gonzaga College High School. The school did not specify the one reason behind the decision. (Fey / ugo)
